body_html:
I think all necessary changes have been made. The AT_API macro now appears before the TensorInfo class in ATen. Although I did run these tests on the function in THC, too, this submitted version does not test the THC version because I did not want to import AT_API to THC. The functions are identical, however, so that testing is likely not needed.

The additional test file may be useful in the future for testing other tensor behavior related to pointwise apply, too.

body:
I think all necessary changes have been made. The AT_API macro now appears before the TensorInfo class in ATen. Although I did run these tests on the function in THC, too, this submitted version does not test the THC version because I did not want to import AT_API to THC. The functions are identical, however, so that testing is likely not needed.

The additional test file may be useful in the future for testing other tensor behavior related to pointwise apply, too.
